name: Phase 1: USAC Data Pull and Enrichment

nodes.name: Schedule Trigger - Daily 7 AM CST
nodes.notes: Runs every day at 7:00 AM CST to pull new Form 465 filings

nodes.name: GET Form 465 Filings from USAC
nodes.notes: Retrieves Form 465 filings posted in the last 24 hours from USAC Open Data API

nodes.name: Extract and Transform Filing Data
nodes.notes: Normalizes USAC data fields to match Supabase schema and combines document links into JSONB format

nodes.name: Loop Over Each Clinic
nodes.notes: Process each clinic individually for historical funding enrichment

nodes.name: GET Historical Funding Data
nodes.notes: Retrieves 3-year historical funding data (2023-2025) from USAC endpoint 2kme-evqq

nodes.name: Merge Historical Funding
nodes.notes: Collects historical funding into JSONB array and merges with clinic record

nodes.name: Insert into Supabase
nodes.notes: Inserts enriched clinic record into clinics_pending_review table (skip duplicates based on form_465_hash)

nodes.name: Log Completion
nodes.notes: Logs workflow completion with statistics (filings processed, timestamp, status)
